title: Reduce UI component size from large to medium

requirements.text: Reduce the size of UI components from large to medium throughout the application. This applies to buttons, cards, input fields, text elements, and other interface components that are currently rendered at large scale.

quotes: yes can you make the size medium its kinda large

acceptanceCriteria: All UI components display at medium size instead of large
Text, buttons, cards, and form inputs are proportionally scaled down
Layout remains coherent and usable at the reduced size
Spacing and padding are adjusted to match medium scale

nonGoals: Changing functionality or behavior of components
